name: Journey of Agapito Bagumbayan
description: This is an educational game which shows the historical places in San Juan City, together with its history. our main goal is to share knowledge to people out there the forgotten history of each places that we took for granted. we wanted everyone, especially the children in this city to know the history of the place they live in. The objective of this game is to promote San Juan City to tourists and to students that's having their field trip in Museo ng San Juan. we would want this game to be a medium for learning the history of San Juan city.
